name: PodcastGenie
0:
”Alexa open pod genie”
”Alexa, ask pod genie when should I launch my podcast?”
”Alexa, ask pod genie what is streamlined?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pod genie
des: Did you know that 80% of podcast listeners listen to the entire episode? Did you know that 45% of podcast listeners have a household income of 250k or higher? I'm sure you're beginning to see just a few of the reasons as to why we like podcasting so much! If you ever wanted to start your own podcast but are unsure of where to start, just ask the genie!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
